name: biscuittruths
0:
”Alexa, open biscuit truths”
”Alexa, start biscuit truths”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: biscuit truths
des:
Listen to this story with a timeless lesson. In Tibetan Buddhism, the Id and Ego are meaningless, while BhodhiChitta is the ego and the 'I' sense, the Id has the monkey-chitta, the canine aspect and the deer-chitta. 
In the authors personal life are strange inner characters, MahaYogi the knowledged, Manga Ram, the biscuit baker and monkey headed chitta, Bhola Ram, the pet bear of Swami Rama and Haldi Ram, the maker of treats and sweets. 
Listen to many stories of these inner characters. 
In this story is the transition from the monkey-chitta to the Bodhi, in silent meditation by Manga Ram, a businessman. 
Add this story to your bag of stories, if you identify with similar characters in yourself - will you make a journey from half baked knowledge to true self realized one?
At any point, you can say "Alexa, stop" to exit the skill. This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
